title.native: 転生したらスライムだった件 コリウスの夢
title.romaji: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Coleus no Yume
title.english: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Visions of Coleus

description:
Rimuru has saved the children he was teaching in the Kingdom of Engrassia, and his time as a teacher is nearly over. Then Yuuki, Grandmaster of the Free Union, asks him to get to the bottom of the race for the throne in the Kingdom of Coleus, which is located between Engrassia and the Holy Empire of Lubelius. So Rimuru infiltrates Coleus under the name "Satoru," and he finds a nation at the mercy of not only a battle for succession, but a web of schemes woven by demons and vampires!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Coleus' Dream
Moi quand je me réincarne en Slime : Le rêve de Coleus
เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว ฝันแห่งโคลีอัส

tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

転生したらスライムだった件

name.native: ルミナス・バレンタイン

node.description:
__Height:__167 cm  
__Hobbies:__ Billiards, drawing, remaking clothes, singing  
__Skills & Abilities:__ Waking up early    

[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/terashimatakuma/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Terashima_dayo) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2XXSJBvNygj81VPOJmCu-g)

His debut album "New Game" came out on June 6, 2012. Announced marriage with voice actress [Satomi Satou](https://anilist.co/staff/101560/Satomi-Satou) on July 6, 2017.

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=30) | [Official Website](https://www.okasakimiho.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/okasakimiho_PR) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/okasakimiho) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miho_Okasaki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡咲美保)

**Non-anime roles:**
• Hator - Memento Mori (VG)
• Anis - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
• Barcarola - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

Tomiyasu Ken'ichirou is a Japanese concept artist and art director. He is the representative director of INEI.

(Source: AnidB)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Taiki_Kawakami)

Taiki Kawakami is a Japanese writer and artist.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%B8%E7%94%B0%E9%9A%86%E5%AE%8F)

Takahiro Kishida is an animator and renown character designer.

Kishida's designs are well received by animators and attract talent into shows easily. He is also praised for his shot composition skills and copies of his layouts are widely distributed in the industry as drawing reference. Nowadays he is mostly only credited for character design in the shows he participates in, but in reality he works as an animation director uncredited quite often. He rarely heavily corrects the key animator's cuts, strongly believing that the animators' distinctiveness should be noticeable.

Noted for his designs on shows like [Haikyuu](https://anilist.co/anime/20464/), [Serial Experiments Lain](https://anilist.co/anime/339/), [Madoka Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/), [Baccano](https://anilist.co/anime/2251/) and more.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
Fujima Hitoshi is a composer and arranger.

[Website (Hedworks)](http://hedworks.sakura.ne.jp/info.html) | [Twitter (Hedworks)](https://twitter.com/hed_works)

The president of Hedworks, a company that produces background art for anime and games.

_Note: Not to be confused with either of the two animators, [佐藤雅弘](https://anilist.co/staff/134126/) and [佐藤正博](https://anilist.co/staff/222513/)._

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/DublandoCoisas) | [Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/dublandocoisas) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/DublandoCoisas)

Lucas Almeida is a Brazilian actor, director and voice actor. He is married to [Mayara Stefane](https://anilist.co/staff/197179/).
__Mike McFarland__ is an American voice actor, ADR Director, Script, and Line Producer at Funimation Entertainment.
Clint Bickham is an American voice actor and ADR script writer working with Funimation Entertainment/OkraTron 5000 and ADV Films/Seraphim Digital.
